briefdescription.para: Allows the user to edit details of a session.

detaileddescription.para: This method displays a list of sessions for the current user's group and prompts the user to choose a session to edit. It then allows the user to edit the session's title, date, and description.

parameterdescription.para: The Scanner object used for input.

detaileddescription.para:
Displays the resource sharing menu and handles user choices. Allows users to share resources or view existing resources.
scanner
Scanner object for user input

Allows the user to share a resource by providing title, description, and link. Adds the shared resource to the system and saves it to file.
scanner
Scanner object for user input

Allows the user to view details of a specific resource. Displays the title, description, and link of the resource if found.
scanner
Scanner object for user input

briefdescription.para: Allows the user to edit details of a resource.

detaileddescription.para: This method displays a list of resources for the current user's group and prompts the user to choose a resource to edit. It then allows the user to edit the resource's title, link, and description.

parameterdescription.para: The Scanner object used for input.

detaileddescription.para:
Displays the discussion board menu and handles user choices. Allows users to create a new discussion or view existing discussions.

Scanner object for user input

Allows the user to create a new discussion by providing a topic. Adds the created discussion to the system and saves it to file.

Scanner object for user input

Allows the user to view details of discussions and add comments to them.

Scanner object for user input

briefdescription.para: Allows the user to edit details of a discussion.

detaileddescription.para: This method displays the discussions for the current user's group and prompts the user to choose a discussion to edit. Users can edit the topic of the discussion if they have permission.

parameterdescription.para: The Scanner object used for input.

detaileddescription.para: Main load point of the CoordinatorApp program. Initializes the application by loading data and starting the main menu.
Main entry point of the CoordinatorApp program. Initializes the application by loading data and starting the main menu.

CoordinatorApp is the main class that manages the functionality of the coordinator application. This application allows users to manage study groups, schedule sessions, share resources, and participate in discussions.
